Title: Relates to prohibiting time limits or curfews on fares provided to students
Summary: Prohibits the imposition of time limits or curfews on fares provided to students as part of a student fare program.
LawCode: Add ยง1266-l, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to prohibiting time limits or curfews on fares provided to students
